snippet.title: Press X to Not Die - Trailer
snippet.description:
Available now on Steam!
http://store.steampowered.com/app/402330/

You wake up to find your town in chaos. Everyone has gone crazy and is just attacking each other! A cryptic message is the secret to survival-- Press X to not die! 

Survive the streets, find your girlfriend, find out what happened, and get the hell out of town in this thrilling live-action interactive movie adventure! 

* Over 30 minutes of HD footage! 
* Uncover the secrets behind the madness in a branching storyline that reflects your choices! 
* Make out with your girlfriend! 
* Fight a clown!

http://facebook.com/pressxtonotdie1
http://twitter.com/pressxtonotdie1


Music Credits:
"The Escalation" & "Volatile Reaction" by Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
"Spinnin'" by Alex Beroza
Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0
http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/
